oracleReaderQuery.value:
select c.COLUMN_NAME as name,      c.COLUMN_NAME as description,     
              case  DATA_TYPE       WHEN 'NUMBER' THEN 'int64'   
                WHEN 'DATE' THEN 'dateTime'      WHEN 'TIMESTAMP(6)' THEN 'datetime'     
                else 'string'       END as dataType    
                 FROM all_tab_cols c     
    where c.TABLE_NAME = '@{pipeline().parameters.SourceTable}'    
  and c.COLUMN_NAME in (@{pipeline().parameters.WorkingColumnArray})

select * from @{pipeline().parameters.BatchSchema}.@{pipeline().parameters.SourceTable}  WHERE @{pipeline().parameters.CreateTimestampColumnName} > TO_DATE('@{formatDateTime(pipeline().parameters.LastSeenCreateTimestamp,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss')}', 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:MI:SS') - interval '@{pipeline().parameters.DeltaReverseTimeOffsetInSecs}' second;

select * from @{pipeline().parameters.BatchSchema}.@{pipeline().parameters.SourceTable} WHERE @{pipeline().parameters.EditTimestampColumnName} > TO_DATE('@{formatDateTime(pipeline().parameters.LastSeenEditTimestamp,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss')}', 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:MI:SS') - interval '@{pipeline().parameters.DeltaReverseTimeOffsetInSecs}' second;
